review: Thorough professional and very attentive to patient’s concerns. Checked thoroughly and went through medical records minutely.
Very good and calm doctor, explained all the symptoms in detail and medicine there in. Examining of report complete and physical checkup of patient was good

I  have booked  the appointment for my myself  and it was  related to my health concern. Doctor was good in consulting me. Doctor was available and there was no waiting time in hospital. I can definitely recommend the doctor to our  family and friends.It was very good. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. I am completely satisfied with the treatment given. Doctor was pretty friendly with me.
Great doctor , ********* *********** *** humble. Explains the diagnosis and doesn’t prescribe tests for everything.
I went to the doctor for my father in law. He was very good and explained the treatment well. I must say that I  am satisfied with the given information. Thank you.
